MS MCQs

    Create purchase documents in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Which one of the following statements about purchase processes in Business Central is true?

      You can start a purchase process with a sales quote.

      Posting an item receipt from a purchase order will create a posted purchase receipt and will update the inventory.

      Entering a purchase invoice will update the vendor card.

      Invoicing a purchase order will update the chart of accounts.


    2. A purchase order can be created by using all but which of the following processes?

      By using the Make Order action from the purchase quote

      By directly creating a new purchase order from the orders list

      By using the Make Order action from a blanket purchase order

      By using the Make Order action from the purchase invoice


    3. Which purchase document must you use to receive an item of various (or equal) amounts over the course of the year?

      Purchase quote

      Purchase order

      Blanket purchase order

      Purchase invoice
